ISSUE.TITLE: [FEATURE] Redo MobSFy on MobSF update.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If you're requesting a new feature/enhancement, explain why you'd like it to be added and it's importance. **Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.** Currently we do not update Frida server in existing MobSFyed VMs. This causes a version mismatch. **Describe the solution you'd like** Detect update and do MobSFy again.
